title: Vieira de Castro (Dr. Luís)
body:
He was born in this city on May 10, 1898, the son of Henrique Augusto Vieira de Castro and D. Alegria Adida Vieira de Castro. He attended the high school in Funchal and holds a bachelor's degree in law from the University of Coimbra.

He began his career in literature at an early age, collaborating in various newspapers and publishing some of his writings in a volume while still attending our high school. He has already made a significant contribution to many newspapers and magazines, having been an editor and regular contributor to some periodicals in Coimbra. At the end of 1923, he started the publication of a daily newspaper in this city called Jornal da Madeira, of which he is the director. He published the following volumes:

> Nebuloses

, Funchal, 1916,

> Livro Extranho

, Porto, 1916,

> Civilisados

, Coimbra, 1918

> A Hora Internacional e a Nacionalidade Portugueza

, Coimbra, 1919, and a Europa e a Republica Portuguesa

, Coimbra, 1922 (1921).

Subsequently, he published

> O Mundo que finda e o mundo que começa

, 1936,

> D. Carlos I

, 1936,

> Limbo

, 1936,

> Em Pé de Guerra

, 1937,

> A Formação de Portugal

, 1938

> Pedra sobre Pedra

, 1942, and

> Rumo à Vitoria

, 1943.

Funchal: Location of Luís Vieira de Castro's birth
Coimbra: Location where he graduated in law

Henrique Augusto Vieira de Castro: Father of Luís Vieira de Castro
D. Alegria Adida Vieira de Castro: Mother of Luís Vieira de Castro

1898: Luís Vieira de Castro was born in the city of Funchal
1923: Luís Vieira de Castro started the publication of the daily newspaper Jornal da Madeira
